tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE chat_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE interactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), interaction_time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE chat_messages (id INT PRIMARY KEY, message TEXT, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_time TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE players (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), registration_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE chat_log (id INT PRIMARY KEY, interaction_id INT, message_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (interaction_id) REFERENCES interactions(id), FOREIGN KEY (message_id) REFERENCES chat_messages(id));
